metadata.title: CVE-2023-52480 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix race condition between session lookup and expire Thread A + Thread Bksmbd_session_lookup | smb2_sess_setup sess = xa_load | | |xa_erase(&conn->sessions, sess->id); | | ksmbd_session_destroy(sess) -->kfree(sess) | // UAF! | sess->last_active = jiffies | + This patch addrwsem to fix race condition between ksmbd_session_lookup andksmbd_expire_session.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
